roleset.name: suspicious, wary of belief
roleset.note: SKEPTICAL-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, comparison to cynical.01. (from skeptical.01-j)

role.descr: stimulus, what arg1 is skeptical about

example.name: both args, complement clause arg0
example.text: Frankly, i was somewhat skeptical that this book could deliver on the promises made in its subtitle.
example.arg: that this book could deliver on the promises made in its subtitle

example.name: propositional arg0
example.text: I was skeptical about an online program prior to enrolling at TCSPP.
